login.title: Login
login.description: Enter your email below to login to your account.

register.title: Sign Up
register.description: Enter your information to create an account

legal.agree: I agree to the terms and conditions
legal.description: By signing up, you agree to our

home.description: Here you can find all the bookable objects you have access to within the selected group.

emailVerification.title: Verification Email Sent
emailVerification.description: Please check your email to verify your account.

process.title: Email is being verified
process.description: Please wait while we verify your email.
process.wait: This should take only a few seconds. If it takes longer, please contact support.

success.title: Email Verified
success.redirect: You will automatically be redirected to the login page in 5 seconds. Or you can go back to

noToken.title: No token found
noToken.description: No token was found in the URL. Please check your email for the verification link.

invalidToken.title: Invalid token
invalidToken.description: The token is invalid, has expired or has already been used.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your account settings and set e-mail preferences.

telegram.title: Telegram
telegram.description: Link your Telegram account to receive notifications

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: This is how others will see you on the site.
profile.uploadImageHelp: Upload a new image to change your profile picture.
profile.displayNameHelp: This is the name that will be displayed publicly when you approve a booking.
profile.emailHelp: This is the email address that will be displayed and to which we are sending emails to.

validation.displayNameMin: Username must be at least 2 characters.
validation.displayNameMax: Username must not be longer than 30 characters.
validation.firstNameMin: Username must be at least 2 characters.
validation.firstNameMax: Username must not be longer than 30 characters.
validation.lastNameMin: Username must be at least 2 characters.
validation.lastNameMax: Username must not be longer than 30 characters.
validation.emailRequired: Please select an email to display.

success.title: Profile updated
success.description: Your profile has been updated successfully.

account.title: Account
account.description: Update your account settings. Set your preferred language and timezone.

deleteAccount.title: Delete account
deleteAccount.description: If you delete your account, all your data will be permanently removed from our servers. All bookable objects that you created, their bookings and all groups you created will be deleted.

confirmation.title: Are you absolutely sure?
confirmation.warning: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove your data from our servers.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.userOverrideHelp: This setting will override all other settings. If disabled, you will not receive any notifications.

groups.title: Groups
groups.help: Setting group notifications will disable all notifications if you are receiving a notification because you are part of the group. If you are owner of a bookable object, you will still receive notifications for that object if not disabled below.

bookableObjects.title: Bookable Objects
bookableObjects.help: Setting bookable object notifications will disable all notifications coming from the bookable object.

demo.title: Demo Mode
demo.avatarDisabled: Avatar updates are disabled in demo mode.

avatar.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the avatar?
avatar.demoDisabled: Image upload is disabled in demo mode
avatar.noPermission: You do not have permission to change this image

demoMode.title: Demo Mode Active
demoMode.description: This is a demo environment with limited capacity:

contactRequest.intro: If you'd like to use this platform personally or for your organization, please reach out for a full account.
contactRequest.emailHelp: In case we need to contact you regarding your request
contactRequest.messageHelp: Please describe what you would like to use the platform for.

validation.messageLength: Please enter a message with at least 10 characters
validation.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address

requestSent.title: Request sent
requestSent.description: Your request has been sent to the admin

error.title: Error
error.description: An error occurred while sending the request

publicVisible.label: Public Visible
publicVisible.description: Toggle to make the bookable object publicly visible.

confirmBooking.label: Booking requires confirmation
confirmBooking.description: If this is set to off, a booking doesn't require confirmation and it gets automatically confirmed.

confirmRole.label: Confirm Role
confirmRole.description: Select the role a group member needs to confirm a booking.

informationShared.label: Information shared
informationShared.description: Everyone with the sharing link can view booking details.

defaultSettings.name: Name
defaultSettings.nameDescription: Please enter the name of the bookable object.
defaultSettings.descriptionDescription: Please enter the description of the bookable object.
defaultSettings.groupDescription: Please select the group of the bookable object.

deleteAlert.title: Delete bookable object
deleteAlert.description: Are you sure you want to delete this bookable object?

deleteToast.title: Bookable object removed
deleteToast.description: The bookable object has been removed.

drawer.title: Edit profile
drawer.description: Make changes to your profile here. Click save when you're done.

groupList.noGroups: You currently don't have any groups and are not a member of any groups.

rejectInvite.title: Reject Invite
rejectInvite.description: Are you sure you want to reject the invite for the group "{groupName}"?

groupMember.title: Team Members
groupMember.description: Invite your team members to collaborate.

newGroupDialog.title: Create group
newGroupDialog.description: Add a new group to manage rooms and other bookable objects.

groupMemberCard.title: Team Members
groupMemberCard.description: Invite your team members to collaborate.

groupDataBody.groupNameDescription: This is the name of the group that will be displayed to users.

validation.nameMin: Group name must be at least 2 characters.
validation.nameMax: Group name must not be longer than 30 characters.
validation.descriptionMax: Group description must not be longer than 160 characters.

deleteUser.title: Remove user from Group
deleteUser.description: Are you sure you want to delete the user "{email}" from the group "{groupName}"?

roleUpdated.title: User role updated
roleUpdated.description: The role has been updated to {role}.

userRemoved.title: User removed
userRemoved.description: The user has been removed from the group.

groupView.selectGroup: Select a group to view details.

deleteGroup.title: Delete Group
deleteGroup.description: Are you sure you want to delete the group "{{name}}"?

drawer.title: Edit profile
drawer.description: Make changes to your profile here. Click save when you're done.

name.label: Name
name.description: Please enter the Name that is displayed in the event calender. This could be your full name or a nickname, or the name of the event.

saveInfo.label: Save Info
